name: Cyber-aitor
description:
Made for DMSPILJAM 2020

You are a new fighter in the arena and you have to kill as many robots and cyborgs as you can before your time is up.

Gather powerups to help you succed and see how long you can last.

  • Movement:
    • WASD
  • Shooting:
    • Press and or hold left mouse button
  • Invisibility:
    • Spacebar
